about_the_game:
Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be a roomba on a spaceship? Look no further than DOOMBA!

DOOMBA is a sci-fi cleaning simulator adventure made in Unreal Engine 5. Your job? Clean the infected cargo ship and eliminate the source of the infection. Led along by the snarky ship AI, you'll pick up tools and upgrades along the way. Just be careful- In space, no one can hear you clean.

DOOMBA is the product of three person team MJR- Malachi Franson (Level Design, Programming, Tech Art), Joshua Watson (3D Generalist), and Rees Jackson (Environment Art and Materials) for our Senior Thesis 2024 for the Game Art program at Ringling College of Art and Design.
detailed_description:

DOOMBA is a sci-fi cleaning simulator adventure made in Unreal Engine 5. Your job? Clean the infected cargo ship and eliminate the source of the infection. Led along by the snarky ship AI, you'll pick up tools and upgrades along the way. Just be careful- In space, no one can hear you clean.

DOOMBA is the product of three person team MJR- Malachi Franson (Level Design, Programming, Tech Art), Joshua Watson (3D Generalist), and Rees Jackson (Environment Art and Materials) for our Senior Thesis 2024 for the Game Art program at Ringling College of Art and Design.
name: Doomba

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: 8GB RAM of RAM or more
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

publishers: Ringling College of Art and Design
short_description: DOOMBA is a sci-fi cleaning simulator adventure made from Ringling College. Your job? Clean the infected cargo ship and eliminate the source of the infection. Led along by the snarky ship AI, you'll pick up tools and upgrades along the way. Just be careful- In space, no one can hear you clean.
